actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize flood control and flood protection measures for the Tug Fork and Levisa Fork of the Big Sandy River, West Virginia and Kentucky and the Cumberland River, Kentucky.
short_title: Big Sandy River Flood Control Act of 1979

summary.text: Big Sandy River Flood Control Act of 1979 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to design, construct, and undertake flood control measures on portions of the Cumberland River, Kentucky, and the Big Sandy River, Kentucky, Virginia, and West Virginia.

titles.title: Big Sandy River Flood Control Act of 1979
A bill to authorize flood control and flood protection measures for the Tug Fork and Levisa Fork of the Big Sandy River, West Virginia and Kentucky and the Cumberland River, Kentucky.
